author: Lobo_da_boss_
title: A great improvement of previous Muppets done in this style!
review:
Opening:

Fozzie Bear is another greatly iconic member of The Muppets, and he was inevitably included in this CMF series. And his Minifigure execution is brilliant and accurate.

The Minifigure-

Fozzie has an exclusive dual moulded head and hat combo with his eyes and mouth printed. The torso has his scarf printed accurately, and brilliant side arm printing depicting subtle fur, which was missing from previous characters such as Elmo and Cookie Monster, his legs also continue this detail with side printing adorning the available sides.

The Accessories-

His accessories include both a 4 piece black microphone with stand which is quite decent, and a yellow moulded banana which is fine, but I believe a new piece for a rubber chicken would've been more appropriate, as that is his more iconic utensil. The stand is the standard black CMF stand.

In Conclusion-

Fozzie Bear is not only one of the best characters that The Muppets have to offer, but he is also one of the best looking Minifigures in this series, he is one of the figures that I see a price increase as inevitable in future, thus why I recommend you get him soon if you do desire to obtain this Minifigure.
